title: Toshirō Tomochika
text: is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and <a href="politician">politician</a>, an independent and member of the <a href="House%20of%20Councillors">House of Councillors</a> in the <a href="Diet%20of%20Japan">Diet</a> (national legislature). A native of <a href="Matsuyama%2C%20Ehime">Matsuyama, Ehime</a> and graduate of <a href="Waseda%20University">Waseda University</a>, he was elected for the first time in 2007.
